  • 网站关于/捐赠

    • 网站关于/捐赠

This command prints out the entity details of the entity you are facing the view towards, or the player you are spectating. This makes it work like a more specific version of mirv_listentities.

# Supported Games

Only Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is supported.
